paragraph: Hello! Here is a short overview of some of the work I have done, and some I am currently working on. I mainly specialize in Full-Stack development in Javascript (Next.js, React, React-Native), EJS, HTML, PHP, and CSS. I have muliple years of experience with Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and SQL as well. Over the past couple of years I have leaned into working in the space of Blockchain Technology, and most recently AI, working heavily with Python. I am currently in possession of a DOD Secret Clearance, and am in the process of being TS/SCI cleared as of September 2024
